channel.title: meet on The Rules
channel.description: Recent content in meet on The Rules

item.title: #20 - Meet
item.description: Every single person on our planet can teach us something new. No, it’s not a mercantile rule. Connections rule in our life. Rule #20: “Meet, don’t be afraid.” Every time you meet new people, it improves your mood, also introduces new opportunities to be a better self, and extends horizons in every possible direction. Originally created and published in Mar 2010
